CatDescriptText: The Steak N Take, located at 2015 Centre Avenue was owned by Michael R. Turner and was in business from November 1971 through April 1973.  They specialized in steak sandwiches, beefburgers, sausages, and "world famous shabazz bean pie."
TitMainTitle: Exterior of the Steak "N" Take lunch counter with view through front window into interior, located on Centre Avenue
